# Entities

**Associated Type**

The type of collection used for `entities`.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Entities : EntityCollection
```

## Managing view content

- **add(_:)**: Adds an entity to this content.
- **remove(_:)**: Removes an entity from this content, if present.
- **entities**: A collection of RealityKit entities that this view content renders within the scene.

items.description: Adds an entity to this content.
items.name: add(_:)

items.description: Removes an entity from this content, if present.
items.name: remove(_:)

items.description: A collection of RealityKit entities that this view content renders within the scene.
items.name: entities
